Comment: > “Nothing happened for a long, long time, you know, for at least over an hour. And then, you know, after that, they finally told us to leave, and I told him I was leaving, they came outside the gate and arrested me,” Baraka said during his appearance on MSNBC’s “The Briefing” Friday night. “So it looked like it was targeted.” >  > He later added that ICE officials “obviously targeted me.”  >  > “I wasn’t the only one out there. They came directly to me and tried to arrest me … no one else. Me,” the mayor told host and former White House press secretary Jen Psaki. “And so, I honestly believe, you know, I was targeted there.”  Certainly wouldn't surprise me that ICE would target a recognizable local politician, and it is a terrifying omen given the lawless approach of this administration. Hopefully this is a watershed moment that starts to make more Americans stand up against the wannabe dictator in the white house's regime
Author: UWCG
